pages.text:
The Perfect Blend of Fun and Serenity
About Us
Unwind. Explore. Repeat.
Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages
Discover your slice of paradise at Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages, a unique luxury resort nestled along a serene seven-acre saltwater lake, surrounded by lush state parks and mangroves. Experience the laid-back essence of Key West living, where you can sip refreshing drinks at the Oasis Tiki Bar, wander the scenic lakefront boardwalk, relax in our inviting year-round pool, or explore the lake by paddleboard or kayak. Welcome to the ultimate escape.
Rules and Regulations
Resort Map
Bayfront Promenade
Pickleball
Outdoor Pool
Food Truck
Playground
Get ready before you arrive
Frequently Asked Questions
Is Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages a pet-friendly resort?
Yes. Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages is a pet-friendly RV resort. We have plenty of open spaces for you and your pet to explore. Our pet-friendly accommodations and amenities, such as a fenced in dog park and yard, ensure you and your pets have a memorable camping experience. Please bring a leash. Dogs must be kept on leashes no longer than six feet when outside their owners vehicles.
What time is check-in and check-out?
RV Sites: Check-in time is 2:00 pm. Check-out time is 11:00 am.
All Bungalows and Airstreams: Check-in time 3:00 pm. Check-out time is 11:00 am.
What's included in the resort fee?
The daily resort fee** provides every guest with:
Key Aquatic facility access with a Heated Swimming Pool for the winter months and a chiller for the summer.
Water Sport & Bike Rentals
Tiki Bar with Fire Pit
Pet Friendly
Wi-fi
Restroom & Shower Facilities
($) Indicates that amenity may require additional cost.
(*) Indicates that amenity is seasonal.
(**) Refer to order summary during online check out for all applicable fees.
What are the best things to do when RVing?
Outdoor vacations in an RV give you a great chance to reconnect with nature and bond with your family. There is plenty to do when you do RVing:
Explore the beautiful surroundings of your campground
Go hiking or biking on the nature trails
Enjoy campfires under the starlit sky as you make s’mores
Go swimming, boating, or fishing on our waterfront resort.
Participate in the many resort activities planned for the guests.
What are the best time to visit Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages?
Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages is open year-round. You can enjoy the great Florida weather and indulge in a range of outdoor activities. You can also participate in planned resort events or get to know your surroundings with an abundance of exciting locations attractions and amusement parks.
Do you allow visitors?
Guests are welcome to visit Sugarloaf Key between the hours of 9 a.m. and 8 p.m. All guests must check-in at the registration office before entering the resort and pay applicable visitor fee.
What should I pack for RV camping trip?
Pack smart and safe when planning an RV camping trip. Some of the things to keep include a first aid kit, a basic set of tools, toilet paper, medicines, sunscreen, insect repellant, a rope, drinking water hose, flashlights and headlamps, and a multi-cooker pot.
What are the best things to do in the Florida Keys?
There are a variety of fun and exciting attractions for you to check out with family and children. The most popular attractions include:
Captain Clint Moore Boat Tours
Duval Street
Key West Adventures
Mangrove Mamas
American Shoal Lighthouse
Does Sugarloaf Key RV Resort & Cottages have a swimming pool?
Yes! Enjoy our year round outdoor pool, heated in the winter months and perfectly chilled in the summer. The perfect place to relax poolside while lounging under the palm trees.
